locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Found tons of parking damn near the whole lot at 5:00 p.m. nice clean shower
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos
Good truck stop for fuel, shower, and parking. Lots of options for snacks and quick bites. The staff is friendly and the washrooms are clean. There is an ATM inside.

‚Ä¶ isn‚Äôt a option   If you stop here, prepare to be harassed by management !!!   My husband and I stopped for a shower as he is a truck driver and I ride with him.  Paid cash .. no driver rewards points used While in the shower our door was ‚Ä¶

They only put one towel and the shower is to high can't rinse you body. The gal working today said they told her to put only 1 towel. Seems a bit of not why fuel here gone I am will use go elsewhere then here.

I stopped here for about 18 hrs.  The facilities were clean, I took a shower as well.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  They let me into the fitness room because I didn't have my card.  There is plenty of parking for trucks and cars.
Nice clean place. Shower and washrooms cleans. Good space for parking.

‚Ä¶ Interstarte-5 highway. It has a nice diner, game area, gym, driver's lounge and a travel store too. I was surprised to see that they have a shower and laundry too. Probably paid - i am not sure though. Restrooms were relatively clean. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to make my sandwich that was so nice. I gave her a big tip. I just sleep and fuel sometimes and shower here only I won't buy anything at all.  Plenty of room to park and it's safe. Five stars for parking, two stars for restaurant .

‚Ä¶ the food make it obvious they don't care about the food. They just don't care if someone gets sick from the food that has been sitting for hours past it's time. The only reason I gave them 2 stars was the shower was ready and water hot.
‚Ä¶ Every time we go to San Jose we stop at Petro, this place runs 24/7, if you need to use the restroom, take a shower, get food, or supplies this is the place to go. ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Thank you Loves for having a dog park at your establishment! Traveling several hours with dogs can be a challenge. I will definitely plan trips around your stops and will gladly spend my money there. The bathrooms were clean and stocked, staff was friendly and helpful.

Lots of parking. Dog park. Mexican fast food. Other dining available within walking distance. Store was clean. They have 3 washers and 5 dryers, they all worked well. Normal selections for a truck stop convenience store.
Got gas here. Got an extensive convenience store with a del taco. Store has showers.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I refused to use showers 3 and 6 because they both smelled like sewer gas. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ breakfast. Very tasty. Excellent waitress who was determined to provide the best service possible. Store is busy but a little expensive compared to rest of the nation. Ample parking. Very clean shower with amenities. Very friendly staff.

‚Ä¶ They are great and really hold the place together. I literally took a shower a day ago at a pilots, and I just spent $15 on a shower because I could not stomach using the public free restrooms. Can't say it was the worst $15 I ever spent. ‚Ä¶

Three stars because there is a nice restaurant across the street- Pea Soup Anderson's.
The waitress was rude, the laundry (washers) didn't spin the water out, and the dryers smelled funny. The shower was nice.
Shower was cold and expensive, 17$ per hour. Restrooms clean. Warmly hospitality from the employees. Nice place and good view with wildlife show outside the parking.
They have a Popeyes Chicken, Country Pride, and other things you can buy and microwave. Great place to rest and shower too. Safe place for kids and older ones.

‚Ä¶ today Sept 9 2019 the cook on shift (graveyard) was very very green.  Food was overcooked and portions were extremely small. I gave them a chance but since the diesel 50 to 60gal. To get a shower and no points for food purchases. I'm gone.

TA Employees not here for Help.  Short staff restrooms dirty, no sign that say no shower ask Associate she told I should ask her first.  No refund for shower.  Dirty store dirty employees.  Employee was not interested to help. ‚Ä¶
If you enjoy a lukewarm shower, with occasional bursts that are slightly warmer, this place is great. The saving grace is Anderson's across the street.
Clean facility and nice people. Too much water pressure and shower head wasn't adjustable. Right in the face. Popeyes is always good.

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This place is great, the shower was very clean and the worker Manuel was so polite and told my husband and I to have a nice shower and even told us to have a good night, you could tell he really cared and did a fantastic job. The cashiers ‚Ä¶

Wow!! I walked in the shower and it is EXTREMELY  clean. This is absolutely rare for a Flying J/Pilot. The floor was nice, clean, swept, and no debris in the corners or around the toilet. Totally impressed!!!
‚Ä¶ There is always A-line for the shower now and it could be a whole lot better

You out did you self on this one flying J
Wonderful place. Clean parking lot, store and shower!ü§ò Staff was friendly as well. Thank you! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ store is fine, the service too. Except for the flying j app. In-store... I reserved a shower, I had a number. It popped up, but I didn't get a code. I ask the store manager and he said it is what it is. Now that's kinda rude, so screw them ‚Ä¶
Good place to eat, shower,  use the restroom and relax after a long day of driving.
Big Clean Parking lot & Clean/Big Showers (I had Shower #7). Unfortunately I didn't take any pictures, but its worth it. Hot water was constant so was the pressure. ‚Ä¶

Showers don't have soap or body wash in the showers. Only by the sink.
#9 shower head doesn't work. Only the extended showwr head

Best Flying J I‚Äôve been to. Staff was very courteous and helpful. Bathroom & Showers were very clean. Was busy but didn‚Äôt have to wait long for a shower. Reserved a parking before arriving but they still had open slots at 7pm! My new go to ‚Ä¶
There was a roach in the shower that was supposedly cleaned

showerReviews.reviewText:
A bit higher priced gas than two neighboring gas stations.  A great truck stop, with showers, and a hot dog grill.  Lots of gadgets to buy in the market.  Not too many flashlights available.  Lots of auto and truck accessories.
Ice is available.  The place is kept clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: Took a shower at 4am. It was so hot in the shower area, I called the front desk and asked for them to adjust the heater. The person I spoke to said she can't. Getting dressed was difficult from sweating AFTER my shower. I couldnt dry my ‚Ä¶
It's a busy truck stop, the staff is friendly, shower rooms were ok but a bit small and old. You could get Tacos here, there are some restaurants around this truck stops.
Wasn't impressed with the cleanliness of the shower, and the vent on  door 5, we'll anyone else can see you nude in there.
They really need to clean the fans in the shower. ‚Ä¶
Shower, restrooms are available and clean, several kinds of coffee, snacks and food on the site.
Cheapest gas and very friendly staff! Took a shower here for $13 and the cashier gave me free coffee üíôüíôüíô ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ To anyone getting a shower; make sure you check the plumbing before getting undressed or using the restroom. My toilet backed up. ‚Ä¶

The staff working here was very polite and helpful. We took shower but it was very small. Except that everything was good. Whoever loves tacos they have del tacco and food trucks at walking distance. There is an Indian restaurant called ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was pleasantly surprised. The service was good and the store was clean.  The shower was pretty clean as well and Del Taco hit the spot after a long day of driving. Overall a pretty nice truck stop for a state that hates truckers so much.

‚Ä¶ is the 2 star.   Buttons on pumps are broken so I had to pay inside.  Pumps themselves look rotten.  Shower smelled like puke?  And floor grimey, but shower shoes and the need prevailed on that one.  Water pressure very lacking and ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: They have the nastiest showers i have shower power and I had to pay for my show no towels They say they sell #2 diesel and is not is actually biodiesel this is a ripoff in the pump some say #2 diesel others say biodiesel I ask cashier about ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stumbled upon it late and had many spots open. You can use Pilot card here. The shower comes with a free golf cart ride across the parking lot to another building. Hold on tight my man takes off quick. No towels, but I use my own anyway. A ‚Ä¶

Women's rest room is "out of order" despite the cashier coming out of it as I came in. Showers all have signs saying use shower only, so apparently you can't use a toilet even if you pay for a shower. According to reviews from a year ago, ‚Ä¶
Diesel prices are usually the best, however the driveway needs some work, inside is only minimally cleaned, shower and restrooms could use some TLC
Nasty nothing in the shower is omg disgusting and staff locks doors and its a 24 7 place wth

locations.title: Joe's Travel Plaza
locations.content: Joe's Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Best truck stop I‚Äôve ever been too, out does all the name brand truck stops, not only do they have amazing showers hot water! Clean bathrooms! Easy access to laundry only takes coins, but they have good food inside, they sell beer, easy in ‚Ä¶
Very clean showers with towel and washcloth provided. Was able to shower and wash our car sick toddler, fuel up, snack up, and return to the road with all smiles. Thank you!!!

I showered here a dozen times and tipped the cleaning people everytime until one day I was denied after driving all the way over here. Apparently the showers are only for "commercial" drivers. Yet every employee has sold me a shower except ‚Ä¶

I like the place. Lots of parking. Be prepared though if you want a shower they hold your license until you bring the key back. It just weirded me out someone having my cdl. Shower was modern and very clean. Good water pressure.
Shower was actually really clean üëç was happy about that. Also it‚Äôs $17.00 for a shower. ‚Ä¶

My favorite place to stop along the 5!   Has everything you need, showers are clean ( cashiers hold your license and return it to u when u give them the shower key back).  Dickeys BBQ, Carls Jr in walking distance.   The pre-made sandwiches ‚Ä¶

This place is really bad. I went and took a shower in shower 8 and it's really bad everything is!! dirty !! And the lady that cleans the showers is not a good person I talked to her about the shower and she said yes!! what ever !! I don't ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a pretty decent truck stop has lots of parking, laundry, trucker lounge and showers there‚Äôs a truck was next door Dennys and a Dickeys BBQ. Great place to stop and do your 30 min break or 10 hr rest I‚Äôm giving it a 2 star only because ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ out on the road. Not only Gas station but the Store has Awesome variety and selections.....everything you are needing will almost always be here. Also have shower rooms if you need that too. Plus have a Dennys connected right next door.
Clean very helpful staff, good place to park a lot larger parking area then I thought for semi‚Äôs. Next time I plan on using the shower. I‚Äôll give another update on that one as well.
